attributes.action: Every park and Public Place to have a toilet
attributes.additional_details: because there are a lot of people with Disabilities that want to go for walks with ther families but need to be near a toilet.
attributes.background: I want them to put Toilet facilities in every public place starting with Northampton Kingsthorpe.

rejection.details:
Provision of public toilets is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require local authorities to provide free 24-hour accessible public toilets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555114
